title: Syria, Trade & Impeachment Update
itunes:title: Syria, Trade & Impeachment Update
description:
Kevin spoke with Brett Bruen, President of the Global Situation Room and former White House Director of Global Engagement, and Richard Fowler, Nationally Syndicated Radio Show Host and Fox News Contributor.

Kevin also spoke with Marc Lotter, Strategic Communications Director for the Trump 2020 campaign. to talk news of day, trade and whistleblower latest.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
